column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A------ fire engulfed an electricity pole along Street 261
column7: causing residents to intervene. A firetruck then arrived at 5 am on September 8
column9: the flames suddenly erupted after a small fire began. Residents used extinguishers before police in Toul Kork arrived. The fire was but out without causing any injuries. ------TVFB
